title: Dream Syndicate - Ghost Stories (1988) Flacs
description:
The Dream Syndicate - Ghost Stories/Reissue + Bonus Tracks (1988/2004)
FLAC

from allmusic:
Opening with the self-referential "The Side I'll Never Show," and produced by Neil Young and Crazy Horse vet Elliot Mazer, Wynn and Co. mine the dark and rusty terrain of folk and blues-rock that they ultimately made work to their advantage on this very straight-ahead rock album. Wynn's vocal style and forthright lyrics never really connected with the masses at the time, but years later, it's clear he was making music for the ages.


Track Listing:
1. The Side I'll Never Show
2. My Old Haunts
3. Loving the Sinner, Hating the Sin
4. Whatever You Please
5. Weathered and Torn
6. See That My Grave Is Kept Clean 
7. I Have Faith
8. Someplace Better Than This
9. Black
10. When the Curtain Falls

Bonus Tracks:
11. When the Curtain Falls
12. If You Should Ever Need a Fool
13. Never Ending Rain
14. Whatever You Please
15. Darlin' They Know
16. Carolyn
17. I Ain't Living Long Like This
18. Spill the Wine
